sentences.en: He was about to chair a meeting in Venice of EU foreign ministers.
sentences.cn: 他将主持在威尼斯召开的欧盟外长会议。

sentences.en: Her gran lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.cn: 她奶奶借给她一架相机，让她带上参加学校组织的威尼斯和埃及之旅。

sentences.en: I think we've got our lines crossed somewhere . I said Venice, not Vienna.
sentences.cn: 我想我们有点误会, 我说的是威尼斯, 不是维也纳.

sentences.en: If my lucky number comes up, we'll have a holiday in Venice.
sentences.cn: 如果我走运的话, 我们就去威尼斯度假.

sentences.en: In 2008, they built a “nest” of branches on the balcony of the Russian pavilion at the Biennale of Architecture in Venice and have exhibited in Paris and Luxembourg.
sentences.cn: 在2008年威尼斯建筑双年展上，他们用树枝在俄罗斯馆的阳台上造了一个“鸟巢”，这个作品后来又分别在巴黎和卢森堡展出。

sentences.en: Major works of painting, sculpture, mosaic and architecture were examined in situ in Venice.
sentences.cn: 重要的绘画、雕塑、镶嵌画和建筑作品都在威尼斯原地得到了仔细检查。

sentences.en: Solve only the first of the two problems; you will be Venice, you will be England.
sentences.cn: 只解决这两个问题中的第一个吧，你将成为威尼斯，你将成为英格兰。

sentences.en: The director transposes Shakespeare's play from 16th century Venice to present-day England.
sentences.cn: 导演把莎士比亚的戏剧从16世纪的威尼斯改成当代的英国。

sentences.en: The painting depicts the Grand Canal, Venice, looking north from the Rialto Bridge.
sentences.cn: 这幅画描绘的是从里亚托桥向北望的威尼斯大运河.

sentences.en: They call it “the Venice of the North” and “beauty on water”.
sentences.cn: 人们把它叫做北方的威尼斯，或者水上美人。

sentences.en: They were married on August 9 in a civil ceremony in Venice.
sentences.cn: 他们于8月9号在威尼斯举行了世俗婚礼。
威尼斯有许多知名的酒店。

sentences.en: Venice is celebrated for its beautiful buildings.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯以美丽的建筑而闻名.

sentences.en: Venice is haemorrhaging the very resource which could save it: its own people.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯正在丧失它的立足之本，那就是它的人民。

sentences.en: Venice is one of the great tourist attractions of the world.
sentences.cn: 威尼斯是世界上令人向往的旅游胜地之一.

sentences.en: We broke our journey to Rome at Venice.
sentences.cn: 我们去罗马时,中途在威尼斯停下来休息了.

sentences.en: We eventually took off at 11 o'clock and arrived in Venice at 1.30.
sentences.cn: 我们终于在11点起飞，1：30到达威尼斯。

sentences.en: We went to Venice for our honeymoon.
sentences.cn: 我们去威尼斯度的蜜月。

trans.tran_cn: 威尼斯（意大利东北部的港埠）
